reviews.review:
This game is fun. Plain and simple. There's a learning curve to this game for sure, learning how to usefully use perks and when to unhook survivors is something you can learn in time. I most definitely am no expert at this game, but I'm not a beginner either. I've had enough experience to say I confidently can recommend this game. Some maps may feel hard to win, and sometimes you might encounter a killer that gives you a sense of hopelessness. What makes this game worth it? The exhilaration. The kick you get from blood as it rushes through you when you dodge attacks that are right on your heels, or popping gens as the killer's tells are ringing in your ears. This is a game you NEED friends to play with, but I find it fun regardless.

9/10 Great game, hard to distinguish flaws in such a simple concept but sometimes maps feel unbalanced and unspoken rules make the game more enjoyable for all.
Великолепная игра с уникальным геймплеем. Затягивает на долго.
kids do you hate youself? well this is the game for you!
Jogo Maneiro
just get it
it's shit

En la actualidad el juego presenta múltiples falencias en lo que respecta a Balance, concretamente en el apartado de los supervivientes se muestra un favoritismo de parte de los desarrolladores, cosas como la generación excesiva de pales y loops demasiado cercanos; la incapacidad del Killer de establecer sus maldiciones si el tótem se rompe; el uso de múltiples segundas opciones del lado de los supervivientes como  "dead hard" "decisive strike" "unbreakable" "selfcare" etc... etc.. . Por otra parte, el juego presenta grandes fallas en torno a la regulación de desventajas, el motor anti-cheating se vuelve bastante redundante cuando un equipo de supervivientes (SWF) utiliza comunicaciones externas como Discord o Skype,  hecho que en la mayoría de los casos termina con el asesino perdiendo la partida gracias a que la comunicación rompe el principal pilar del juego que es el manejo de la información, esto sin mencionar el mal balance dentro de los propios Killers y mapas existentes en el juego. Nota final: si vas a jugar como equipo el juego se vuelve bastante simple y divertido, la mayoría del tiempo se gana, si vas con Killer opta por no jugar contra equipos para mejorar tu experiencia y mantener tu salud mental
谢邀 已经玩屠夫高血压了
buen juego vale cada centavo pero te advierto tiene una comunidad toxica

Honestly, addicted. I've played for years across several platforms. I started back since a two year break and theres a surplus of hackers its ridiculous. I can take an L if I suck against the killers/ survivors  but there have been some things like a survivor literally teleporting out of sight. I've seen killers who can't teleport, teleport. Killers zoom around the map off the bat. Outside of that, I love the game.

Game can be fun, devs are garbage, community is sometimes cool but is split among even the basics of playing the game. For new players getting this game, I just can't recommend it.

4/10 Go play CIV 5.

The game is fun when you're bad. In some cases it can be scary, but once you ascend past a certain skill level it can prove to be infuriating. I have a couple hundred hours shared among multiple accounts. The game is unique, and doesn't get boring most times, but with both survivor and killers having opposing goals, if one side does something to thwart the other, it can get really frustrating. If you don't rage easily, and like to make others mad (even if they're on your own team), then dbd is for you.

Here's an update on the matter, the continuation of the saga of one of the poorest managed videogame the last years;

Here came the anni 6 announcements and ffsake I can't believe.
How? Not only how but why? 

A lot of grinding-related topics, quality of life basic stuff that should've been in the game has years, a new random killer that adds nothing new or exciting to the game; and literally, NONE of the announcements were directed to improve the gameplay, that admitetly by the majority of the community to be in an awful shape.

As a player that wants to play this as a good and creative option of a party game, it feels like the company tries to make the absolute opposite of it while not being capable of developing it as an efficient option of a competitive game.

Btw, talking about competition, since it's the mood set, if you are playing this game and is inclined to compete out of your way to win, just do these:

As survivor: 
* SWAT coms with friends the whole game, why even information perks and experience the match
* Run Unbreakable, Borrowed Time, Dead Hard/Sprint Burst, DS, Iron Will every game in every team member, for max team chase/rescue performance
* Perfect wall-hugging (its way easier than killer wall hugging) 
* Just force the killer to vault windows during chases, it takes more than 2 seconds to them in comparison to your 0.5 LMAO

As killer:
* Proxy camp and force first death on 1 to 2 hook
* After the first player dies, just slug the hell out of every player, its a waste of time to hook anyway,
* Run NOED, its as lazy and efficient as most survivors rushing gens
* Run 3 anti-gen perks, two of those being DMS and SH:R
* Play with killers not reliant on M1 hit, since its basic chase mechanic is completely on survivor favor
* Dedicate your ass off to perfect wall-hugging and learn hitboxes
* If everything else fail, spam nurse to force other four people to play your own game, not the one they signed up for.

Summing it up: the best way to have fun with this, is to make fun of.

And now mentioning the pushy agenda stuff, the current game team literally made David King sexuality being part of his character, in the same manner Nickelodeon did with Spongebob Squarepants and Patrick; so out of touch, completely disrespecting the work of the original team that first concepted the character and just to push an agenda that is not even part of the game matter.

The same goes for the weeb dating sim shit; dude, who the fuck gives a shit. Your IP is being openly criticized for every dumb and lazy decision you take, the active player count is dropping like hell, the changes you were so resistant to make you were forced to do later (since you were so inclined to trust analytics database and dumb analysis), and yet you go out of yourselves, instead of being commited to solve the issues present in the game, to recognize the players abandoning after thousands of hours of dedication, to be sorry about the bad decisions you took, you present a dating sim game, out of fucking nowhere, expecting to people party with you like its all rainbows.

Ah, and mentioning the performance issue... admitetly was improved somehow; they didn't even mention in the patch notes, but for some reason, the game started to run better for lots of players (including myself) in recent patches. It's not great, but it's something good.

TLDR: Indie game company tries to act like the "cool" kids on the block, ends up being slacky, dismissive, and generally inneficient. It's lost.

Down is my original review, in Jan/2022:

====================================

Let me be crystal clear, so it wont have any doubt for them to remove any exclusive item given to me (which I dont have, morons)

This game is currently one the biggest poorly managed products in the whole video-game industry (if not the worst).
In 12 months, all the game has done except engaging with big IPs to back it up, was getting somewhat involved with NFTs, dealing awfully poor with public opinion, even deserting very long time dedicated people that earned nothing except some fucking digital clothing on their characters, and, on the top of that, the game constantly feels more inaccessible regarding its average performance.

For real, if you can run this game stably at 60 fps or even more holy shit you could rent your computer's processing power to fucking NASA for some easy and honest money; at least more honest than the answers given from this game's team to their customers.

This is the best example of a product that started by really engaged people and as time passed by, more and more money came, it expanded and eventually given to people that really don't understand what are they doing, to the point that the dev QnA of the game is openly recognized by the game community as either just sad, laughable and/or cringeworthy. The dev perspective of the game feels so disconnected from their customers expectation it feels like the same case of "League of Legends" team contradicting their playerbase, saying that "their game characters dont have overloaded kits".

In one year, a complex and creative system of match interactions completely demoted to "just escape lol", for 4 months a dash skill froze the game for console players, a killer ability could stun himself, a poorly implemented hidden mmr system, an ability that allowed the survivor team to heal and recover efficiently without any other requirement, are lazy enough to solve their grind/money-sink problem by giving even more money, letting it be run by cheaters, and the list keeps growing. F that.

If you don't take this game too seriously, it can be a lot of fun. My advice, and what many would say, is play each round to improve your own game play in any small amount... if you only play to win, you're gunna have a bad time.

The initial grind is daunting, but once you have the main perks you want... and especially once you have all of the perks you 'kinda' wanted, you start to appreciate the little interactions in each game regardless of the outcome, and I think that's where this game shines.
poopy butthole stupid dum dum game

Great game and highly recommend if you don't want to be highly competitive or too serious. Just bear in mind it is a very unbalanced game: some perks (like Dead Hard) and some killers (like Nurse) are far OP compared to others. A mix of players wanting to have fun and some who try hard. If you are having fun vs a try hard team/killer just don't sweat and go next. If you want to try hard getting to max rank is very easy and gets un-fun very quickly.

Too much hackers or cheaters loosen up from Anti Cheat checking system, make DBD need a hand from 3rd parties second or third server to help them detect the doer to collect the data from the occurred event. Yet, It will not helpful if the game developer not doing anything to resolve this common phenomenon trend. 

This game is not about lose or win like ID V or other games. 

New trend cheaters or hackers (Hunters - Survivors)
- they not used it anytime, only activate for certain time and gap window when Players are on blind spot or not paying attention (always analyse and recheck again the gameplay if possible).
- lagging your gameplay (Check your ping "ms" and internet conditions) best way is make comparison while using VPN* or not. Because tried with VPN mode on more fluid the gameplay. *Remember not all VPN service providers are top notch need conduct self-experiment.   
- freeze your gameplay while the computer are running fine, only the game are freeze but not until "Not responding status" (gamers are familiar with this) 
-  Drop your FPS gameplay (this one somehow unbelievable exist) for laptop monitor are easy to detect if can delivered motion flow more than 60hz, check game and GPU setting, check computer temprature. Compare it all to find if there is odds condition.    
- certain perks are shown while playing but actually the players don't used that perks when the game finish or you death first and vise versa.
- Players coming towards while on hiding spots (lockers, behind rock, walls, or other obstacles) However, this doesn't apply if you reveals your self on the map, or running around the map without walking that leave track mark for hunters, nor not used certain hunters and survivors power or perks while playing; certain perks belong to certain Survivors and hunters are can read or hiding the aura, sound, red colour spots.  
- Players who used 3rd parties program to ruin the game experiences from other countries which might be true or not the players from that nation, sometimes used console status but not always true to hinder from report, Get skip which cannot access on last lobby after the game finish, Disconnect (DC), or you death as survivors 

~ There are other form of cheat and hack  the DBD lobby while the gameplay start that you can find on YouTube. which quite famous to show it without afraid, shame, or just careless.
~ DBD dedicated server are questionable.
Now is up to you want to be a gamer of this game, nah, or well i can handle the disadvantages of DBD.

Что нужно знать о ДбД
Если ты играешь за маньяка:
1.Нельзя бегать за одним и тем же дольше 10 секунд, за раненными вообще лучше не бегать.
2.Нельзя патрулировать возле крюка, сурвам так неудобно спасать.
3.Нельзя использовать НОЕД, - ты вообще что ли? Вдруг сурв не убежит!
4.Нельзя использовать Гибель Франклина, сурв очень долго искал этот фонарик, он будет плакать.
5.Нельзя делать 4 кила, отпусти последнего сурва, тогда плакать будут только трое.
6.Уточняй каких маньяков разработчики ещё не понерфили и не играй за них, сурвы не любят когда сложно.

Если ты играешь за сурва:
1.Запомни, если ты слил, это потому что маньяк нарушил какой-то из пунктов "Нельзя". Срочно иди пиши разработчикам, что сложна-сложна, непонятно, тогда маньяков ещё понерфят, а тебе дадут больше орешков, осколков, часиков, тотемчиков, дискордиков. Ведь сурвам всё это можно )
